name: Wyatt Poppip's Small Pepsi Adventure
description:
Note: It takes a bit for the game to load up after you press the start button.

My friend made an animation of a frog drinking pepsi. I made a game using his model. This was my first time working with Unity3D. 

I decided to abandon this project in lieu of other things, but I might revisit it eventually. It was a good learning experience.

Controls:
  • Movement - WASD/arrow keys. Controllers should also work.
  • Jump - Spacebar. Controllers should also work.
  • Look up - Q
  • Look behind you - E
  • Menu Navigation - use the mouse to click on buttons as needed.
  • Quit - ESC
